org.ipdr.protocol
Class DataException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          org.ipdr.protocol.DataException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public final class DataException
extends java.lang.Exception
implements java.io.Serializable

Exception thrown when there's an error in the protocol data. Not to be confused with ProtocolMalformedMsgException, which is used when the message itself is messed up.

See Also:
ProtocolMalformedMsgException, Serialized Form
